definition: to worry/to concern oneself with/worried/anxiety/sorrow/(literary) to observe mourning

sentences.english: People often say, day lily is "lotos" for it can "soothe the nerves."
sentences.chinese: 人們常說，黃花菜是“忘憂草”，能安神解鬱。

sentences.english: In China, the flower for mother is day lily, also known as Nepenthe.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，給母親的花通常是萱草花，也叫做忘憂草。
